title: I'm a procrastinator...
comment: App is clever, straightforward, rewarding, easy to use, fun and cute! I have tried many highly recommended tasklists. What happens w those is: I procrastinate> get reminder>feel guilty>swipe reminder from notifications>get additional reminder>now I feel not only guilty, but annoyed >every time I swipe it away it comes back & I become more recalcitrant. Eventually go to settings>turn off reminders and avoid app> rendering it useless. The way Maniana works leaves me feeling cheerful instead & it works 4 me!

title: Thumbs up!
comment: Now, thats what I've been looking for. Its all cool.

title: Perfect!
comment: I love how a task is sent back to your to - list the next day after pushing it to the maniana page. It is a good way to keep a job in front of you, so there is no ignoring it. My thanks for an app that is perfect for my needs.

title: Best
comment: It's interface is simple, easy and good looking, It requires no permissions, no adds.

title: Motivating
comment: Keep you in touch with your to-dos and motivates in a fun way. Postpones your tasks if you couldn't accomplish what you planed so you don't forget.

title: Excellent
comment: Great app and does not require special permissions. Love it!

title: Best app
comment: A best and must app for person like me who forgot things. Very simple to use.

title: Good
comment: This was really simple, but not quite what I'm looking for.  I'd really like an app that let's me break down big projects and that can automatically remind me of recurring tasks.

title: Excellent app.
comment: I like this apps so much. It's help to run my life. Thanks.

title: Simple, easy, perfect
comment: I have used this app to run my life for several months. Love it's simplicity and the ability to put things off as well as get things done. Never any problems. Thanks

comment: perfectly fits to my expectations:-)

title: Simple and easy
comment: Was looking for something not too complicated, the equivalent of having a piece of paper and writing down things to do...this was perfect!

title: So far.....
comment: So good. I love that you can customize the hell out of it to go with your theme.  I also love the uncomplicated feel of everything.  This is my perfect to do app.  Search complete!!!   After playing around with the app... I have 1 suggestion/request... Subtasks...

title: Wonderful app!
comment: Very ready to use, simple, better than any of the others I've tried.

title: Clearly The Best!
comment: This is the best to-do-list app I could find for Android. I especially like how easily you can do voice recognition entries. Personally I would love to be able to create more lists though, e.g. an 'Upcoming' and a 'Someday' list like in Any.do, and a 'Shopping list' would be great too! Thank you for this really nice really free app!

title: Very nice!
comment: Good job... super cool app.

title: Adaptable, Colourful, & Easy!
comment: Very nice programme! You have used all the things I love about "Do It Tomorrow" (by Adylitica) and added some really delightful, user customizable features, including color & sound.  I also like how the font & size can be adjusted on the app as well as its widget.  And since I love novelty & immediate gratification...the randomly chosen positive reinforcement sounds for completed tasks (i.e.  clapping) are a real kick!      I'll really enjoy using this!

title: Simple usefull
comment: Great to do list

title: thank you so much

title: Very cute ,it's a perfect to-do-list apps
comment: Thank you so much!

title: Finally found a good task app!
comment: Been looking for one with a simple interface with a voice shortcut in the widget. Chang the pics to show more fonts cause you can change them. Good work!

title: One of the best
comment: The only thing I'd love to have added would be time based reminders.

title: I absolutely love this ap!
comment: It's simple, cute, and gets to the point. I love how easy it is to use and organize. I do have a suggestion- could you please make a feature/button that picks a random task for you from the list? It would make doing tasks more interesting and fun! Thank you so much for this ap
So simple, so powerful, so useful
Just what is needed. Need more get a dayplanner!

title: Luv it. Simple.
comment: Simple app. Can customize all fonts & colors. So easy to use. Luv it!!!!! A MUST HAVE FOR QUICK TASKS/TO DO LISTS.

title: Maniana
comment: This is an excellent app. I use it every day and find its a great way of 'getter things done'. My grateful thanks to the developer.

title: Great app
comment: Free widget=great app. Tried using Do It Tomorrow and found out that i have to pay to get the widget. Why would i pay for a widget when this app provides it for free! Thanks to the creator.

title: Terrific app!!
comment: Thanks dev, fog a great start to my day. Must have app for me today and since I first found it over a year ago.

title: The best user interface...
comment: ...without all the bells and whistles that lead to further procrastination.  Has the look and feel of Do It Tomorrow and the usability of Any.Do.  And I don't have to give the developer access to my contacts list!

title: Simple but Necessary
comment: Very good. Just try this.

title: Brilliant
comment: My new favourite To-Do app. It's simple, elegant, and I love the customisation options. Strange advertising video and ugly icon are the only things I would change. The app itself is near perfect

title: Wow! Very Useful¡
comment: Its an awsome reminder ¡ Just put short ut on ur screen & get ur work done by d day. & Get satisfied by applouse! WOW!!
Superb!  Beautiful, simple and elegant

title: Would be GREAT if form equaled function.
comment: I really like and appreciate this app, but there are some aspects of it that are in TERRIBLE NEED of updating!!! The 3x3 widget cuts off on the right side. It can be amended by resizing, but then it can't be positioned as flush on its left side to the left side of my screen--as it was before the resizing amending. Also, I don't need nor care to have the little mic icon on the widget toolbar anyway.

title: Missing features
comment: I'd like to have a reminder in this app.

title: Quick, Accurate & All Around Awesome
comment: Best basic To Do app I've found (and I've tried a lot)!  The voice to text note use is very quick and accurate, saves tons of time not having to type everything out.  My only wish is that this developer would also make additional apps with similar functioning like a full notebook where you could make and store various notes and lists by category or one with voice to text entry into a monthly calendar format.  LOVE IT.

title: Best todo list app out there
comment: Hit the delicate balance between ease of use and functionality. A todo list that helps people spend time to do the actual work instead of tweaking the list itself. Simple gestures to modify the list. Pretty, at-home pen-and-paper notebook skin which can be changed. Divides between today and future lists. First time guide which is complete, involving, and beautiful. And applause sound when you get an entry in the list done. Kudos!

title: nice
comment: This is a very good app for ppl learning how to manage time...lovely one (y)
The developer is super responsive. Amazing app.

title: need more colors for marks and double tap action
comment: It's nice app, great work! But can you create more colors for marks in popup dialog, default color and mark as completed by double or triple tap action? Need also bigger buttons at bottom and new note by tap on empty space. Thanks!

title: Samsung Y
comment: It was cute!!! Not for me bc i needed more sublists.. But recommended to someone else...

title: A fun, but effective, to do list
comment: Playful features like the doodled icons and option to have applause every time you complete a task make this app a delight.   The elegant simplicity makes it useful and effective.

title: Great!
comment: After being hustled by a vendor that provides the same procrastination features but asks money for every feature inside the app (!), using this app is a huge advancement. Widgets that are free and come in all shapes, nice presentation, even landscape is supported.
Simply the best and it's free

title: Nice app
comment: Nice and easy, but too small letters. Before updating were big enough.
You can change the text size in Setting. There are separate settings for page title, task text and for widget text size. If you need more information please contact us at maniana@zapta.com

title: Awesome, but needs gtasks sync
comment: This app is awesome! However, it is missing one crucial component: synchronization. If only it had at least gtask sync, it would be truly useful.

title: Simply perfect!
comment: A simple, effective approach to the ToDo list. I looked at a dozen others paid and free, this offers exactly what I want and it works great. It lets you sort and prioritize (colorize) the way YOU want. I chose the "elegant" font in white with a black background and it is beautiful. If you want a basic cross-off list, this is really perfect. I love it and recommend it - one of my top 5 most used apps. And heck, it's free with no ads - what do you have to lose to take a look?  Update 04/01/2012: This developer worked with me to resolve a difficult to reproduce screen bug. I can't say enough good about the experience. The level of dedication and responsiveness has been amazing and I could not be impressed more.

title: This developer
comment: Is one of the best.

title: Great app !
comment: This app is very similar to Do it tomorrow but has a few more settings to customize. I like this simple approach for a todo list. It would be nice to have the handwriting font on the widget as well. Great app though!

title: Really nice TODO list app
comment: I am a regular Google Tasks user, but the one downfall is it isn't easy to make a "list of thing to do today" and be able to push them to the next day if I don't get them done.  Maniana does just that, and I like using it as a tool for managing short lists of things to do during a weekend.

title: Love this app!
comment: Simple, helpful, easy to use. I only wish that it had the ability to set an alert. There's always manana to get it done :)
